Hamilton Jordão Junior

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/2841923109249541
  • Última atualização do currículo em 24/10/2018

I have worked in innovation management and research and development for more than 15 years focused on bionergy (sugarcane, as principal). In the last 2 years, I am in charge of sugarcane varieties portfolio and planting strategies at Raízen. My skills are in Agriculture and Life Sciences area. I am Biologist and Master in Functional and Molecular Biology with an emphasis in Biochemistry. (Texto informado pelo autor)

Outros Projetos
